title: "petite-vue Example"
filters:
  - petite-vue

:::{v-scope="{ showPlot: false, showTable: false, textbox: '' }"}

## v-model

```{r}
#| foo: bar
htmltools::tagList(
  htmltools::tags$input("v-model" = "textbox"),
  htmltools::p("Input is: {{ textbox }}")
)
```

## v-on, v-bind, v-show
```{r}
#| v-on:
#|    click: "showPlot = !showPlot"
#| v-bind:
#|    class: "showPlot ? 'active' : 'inactive'"
htmltools::tags$button("Toggle plot ({{ showPlot ? 'active' : 'inactive'}})")
```

```{r}
#| v-show: "showPlot"
plot(sin(seq(0, 50, 0.1)))
```


## v-if, v-else

```{r}
#| v-on:
#|    click: "showTable = !showTable"
htmltools::tags$button(
  "Toggle table ({{ showTable ? 'active' : 'inactive'}})"
)
```

```{r}
#| v-if: "showTable"
mtcars
```

```{r}
#| v-else: ""
htmltools::div(
  "v-for" = sprintf("row in %s", jsonlite::toJSON(mtcars[1:5, ])),
  htmltools::div("{{ row._row }}")
)
```

:::
